title: Beeper – MS Teams ↔ Matrix Bridge
summary: Shipped a production-ready Matrix–MS Teams bridge for use in Beeper. Reverse-engineered undocumented Teams web APIs to enable full-fidelity cross-platform messaging.

title: Santorini
summary: Full-stack Santorini web app. TypeScript + React client for the board interface, backed by a Java (NanoHTTPD) engine managing worker placement, god-card powers, and real-time turn sequencing.

title: Zero To Exam
summary: An AI-driven exam-prep platform for IB students. Builds personalized practice paths, diagnoses weak spots in real time, and adapts through continuous feedback to guide students from zero to mastery.

title: Relatus
summary: Designed and deployed a full-stack relationship management system (React + Spring Boot + MongoDB). Architected REST APIs, scoring logic, and portable persistence with Dockerized deployment.

title: ContextToCanvas
summary: Built a modular RAG pipeline that generates executable visualizations from structured datasets. Implemented AST sanitization and deterministic orchestration to improve reliability and reproducibility.

title: ETH Royalty Demo
summary: Built a Solidity-based royalty distribution system using Hardhat for automated on-chain payout splitting. Implemented customizable weight allocation and dependency-free ETH distribution logic.

title: TempFeel API
summary: Developed a modular comfort-index modeling service for perceived temperature estimation. Designed extensible environmental factor modeling beyond standard heat-index formulas.

title: Function Generator API
summary: Created a Java library that converts structured test cases into type-safe LLM-backed functions. Implemented schema validation and resilient HTTP wrappers for backend AI integration.

title: Chessi
summary: To help chess enthusiasts improve their chess intuition, I developed this app where users test their skills by guessing the engine's evaluation and by finding and playing the best move on the board.

title: TapSpeech
summary: A startup I co-founded focused on improving communication between residents and caregivers in retirement homes.

title: Productivity timer extension
summary: A Chrome extension that boosts productivity by splitting long study sessions into focused work and rest intervals.

title: MLA8 citation extension
summary: A Chrome extension tailored for creating MLA8 citations for Chinese websites to ensure citation format accuracy and speed up research workflows.

title: MLA8 citation machine
summary: A citation machine tailored to MLA8 rules for Chinese sources to help students cite materials correctly.
